enWisdom: A righteous wife is one of the two [lofty] acquisitions
An agreeable wife is one of the two comforts

Wisdom: الْأُنْسُ فِي ثَلَاثَةٍ الزَّوْجَةِ الْمُوَافِقَةِ وَالْوَلَدِ الصَّالِحِ [الْبَارِّ] وَالْأَخِ الْمُوَافِقِ
enWisdom: Intimacy is in three [people]: A compatible wife, a righteous child and an agreeable brother

Wisdom: أَنْعَمُ النَّاسِ عَيْشاً مَنْ مَنَحَهُ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ الْقَنَاعَةَ وَأَصْلَحَ لَهُ زَوْجَهُ
enWisdom: The person with the most blessed lifestyle is one who has been granted contentment by Allah, the Glorified, and who has been given a good wife

Wisdom: شَرُّ الزَّوْجَاتِ مَنْ لَا تُؤَاتِي [لا تؤتى‏]
enWisdom: The worst of wives is the one who does not comply [with her husband’s wishes]

Wisdom: صِيَانَةُ المَرْأَةِ أَنْعَمُ لِحَالِهَا وَأَدْوَمُ لِجَمَالِهَا
enWisdom: Guarding the woman [from people and places that would harm her chastity] is better for her condition and more lasting for her beauty
The death of one’s wife is the sadness of the hour
The derriere is one of the two faces
The worst comrade is the one who is very suspicious
